metadata.comment: Shadow Copies storage symbolic link creation using operating systems utilities

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('mklink')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('harddiskvolumeshadowcopy')))
